item.title: Man murders daughter-in-law for resisting rape in Raichur district
item.description:
<![CDATA[In a gruesome crime, a man murdered his daughter-in-law after she tried to escape a rape attempt by him in Julumgera village of Raichur district.
The crime occurred on Saturday and a case has been registered in the Idapanur Police Station.
The accused, Ramalingayya, made an attempt to rape the victim at their residence at 9 a.m. on Saturday, the complaint said. And, when she resisted and tried to escape from him, he hit her on the forehead with a shovel and killed her on the spot.
The victimâ€™...]]>
